name: A Stickman Sniper - Arms Assassin Shoot To Kill 2
name_original: A Stickman Sniper - Arms Assassin Shoot To Kill 2
description:
Get ready for a fast paced, action packed sniper game! With multiple views (zoomed out or in), and a variety of bad guys to shoot, this game will keep you entertained for hours!

FEATURES
- Cool stickman characters.
- Rocking sound track.
- Multiple weapon types.
